original_text: While King Nebuchadnezzar was still boasting about his power, he heard a voice from heaven. It said, ‘I am speaking to you, King Nebuchadnezzar. I have taken away your authority to rule as king!
korean_text: 이 말이 아직도 나 왕의 입에 있을 때에 하늘에서 소리가 내려 이르되 느부갓네살 왕아 네게 말하노니 나라의 왕위가 네게서 떠났느니라

sentences.original_text: While King Nebuchadnezzar was still boasting about his power
sentences.korean_translation: 느부갓네살 왕이 여전히 자신의 권력에 대해 자랑하는 동안

sentences.original_text: he heard a voice from heaven
I have taken away your authority to rule as king
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 왕으로 다스릴 너의 권위를 빼앗았노라
